Welcome to uDOS v1.3

Welcome to uDOS v1.3

This note demonstrates the vault layout and theme export pipeline. It highlights that Markdown is truth and the renderer produces static HTML at vault/_site/prose/welcome/index.html.

  • Vault is truth
  • Sync tasks to SQLite index (future work)

Mission

Share knowledge locally via Wizard and export static sites using the Tailwind prose theme.
